title: Not getting Mastery (7) tokens on new client
body:
Hey all,

I recently have been playing quite a few games with Nautilus.  I got a game where I got S- and no mastery token.  Any help would be welcome! Cheers!

replies.body: The updated client is still in testing, so you might not see banners, announcements, or toast notifications.  Looking into your specific issue, it doesn't look like you've earned any tokens for Nautilus yet.  Keep in mind that you need to receive an S or S+ and only in Summoner's Rift.  An S- will not earn a token.  More information is also made available through our [champion mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) guide.  Let me know if that clears things up!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=8i6Nvk9n,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-06T21:58:36.739+0000)
>
> The updated client is still in testing, so you might not see banners, announcements, or toast notifications.  Looking into your specific issue, it doesn't look like you've earned any tokens for Nautilus yet.  Keep in mind that you need to receive an S or S+ and only in Summoner's Rift.  An S- will not earn a token.  More information is also made available through our [champion mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) guide.  Let me know if that clears things up!

Okay! My bad, I thought S- still got tokens. Thanks!

EDIT: I see, just the Mastery 6 can be earned with S-.
